Key Match Events: Turkey's Hakan Çalhanoğlu scored a screamer
Arda Güler missed a gilt-edged chance to settle things midway through the second half
Tomáš Souček equalised for the battling ten men, who went on to give Turkey some real worries
Cenk Tosun sealed it at the death
Tomáš Chorý was shown a straight red card for his involvement in a brawl
Turkey will play Austria in Leipzig next Tuesday
Pre-Game Insights: Turkey were the more creative side, and deserved their victory overall
Post-Match Reflections: Turkey will play Austria in the Round of 16
One of Turkey, Austria, Romania and the Netherlands will make it to the semis
Miscellaneous Highlights: The tension at the Volksparkstadion was palpable
Vitězslav Jaroš, Czechia’s third-choice keeper, was booked for yammering at the referee
Lukáš Červ followed him into the book quick-smart
Czechia’s fans were stunned after the match
Others: The referee, István Kovács, had a lot of paperwork to get through after the match
Turkey's Cenk Tosun scored their second goal against Czech Republic
Turkey's players celebrated making it through to the last 16
